website_summaries.verdict: Bestselling everyday backpack with lots of room for books and school supplies.
pros: Durable and lightweight backpack for general use
cons: Laptop sleeve is short and limited

customer_reviews.title: Durable Roomy Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack for my daughter who's a sophmore in High School. She loves how much room it has and it's very durable for all of the things she has to carry back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: macjune02

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these backpacks for my 10yr old and 12yr old sons. They're not big backpacks but their books and tablets fit just fine. Straps have padding in them, which makes it very comfortable. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: tluvjx3

customer_reviews.title: Logo peels quickly, otherwise sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5th grade son and while the construction is good, the logo is already peeling off. We’ve had it less than two months and he’s definitely not hard on his bags. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 13yo son loves this backpack! Big enough for all of his binders and fits everything he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mom04

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This $60 backpack is small, little, compact, bijou, tiny, miniature, minute, minuscule, toy-sized, will fit a baby, teeny, teensy, itsy-bitsy, itty-bitty, pocket-sized, half-pint, little-bitty, petite, diminutive, elfin...
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Basic Nike backpack, looks good, durable and comfortable. Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Basic Nike backpack, it looks good and it is definitely durable and has plenty of room in it. The side pockets are nice too. Holds a good amount of stuff. I use it as my gym bag and the two zipper areas are nice to separate my clothes/shoes from my body wash and shower shoes. Comfortable straps and back padding but it’s a basic backpack don’t expect anything crazy.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would have lasted a bit longer
customer_reviews.text: This backpack isn't bad, my daughter has used it for several months and it is showing signs of wear and getting a little rough around the edges. She carries a good amount of books though so that's to be expected. I just wish it would have made it through the school year before I needed to buy a new one. I figured the brand name bags would be pretty nice quality, which it's not horrible, but I've had cheaper bags hold up longer so slightly disappointed. It was comfortable for her and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: I like that bookbag because of the different storage capacities, but lasting a whole school yet won’t happen. Well at least not for my high schooler. The bottom isn’t strong enough to carry a lot. It’s only been 4 months of my child using it an it’s got holes already starting at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: JessOrTim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school or literally anything else
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bag since last year, it has not ripped or torn whatsoever despite the abuse I've put it through. The only wearing that has occurred is on the Nike Logo itself with a few pieces being scratched off. The bag is still in amazing condition however in a little over year of use. I've used it for school and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to Middle Schoolers!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It is cute. It has thick padding on the straps for comfort. The straps are adjustable. The back has thick padding, too.the front pocket has lots of useful pockets inside it. The waterbottle holder is deep so your water bottle won’t fall out. ( There are actually 2 water bottle holders, one on each side. The big back pocket is big enough for multiple textbooks and a binder. I would definitely recommend this to middle schoolers, but maybe not high schoolers if you need to fit more than 3-4 textbooks in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, but very flimsy and cheap material. Disappointed. Think I’ll stick with my 10 year old North Face backpack. Color is definitely not as dark gray as the product photo.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great sack
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive for some but we love this bag. My wife uses it as a diaper bag. She loves the padding on the back and the clip that keeps the shoulders together.

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack, comfortable and plentiful room

product_meta.title: Nike unisex-adult Sportswear Hayward Futura Backpack
product_meta.description: Men’s Nike Sportswear Hayward Futura Backpack for Men is a new twist on an old favorite with plenty of room for your gear. The durable shell features a new graphic along with additional pockets for extra small-item storage.
feature_bullets: DURABLE FABRIC: The body of this Nike backpack with 600D polyester has a densely woven design that creates a durable, heavyweight material.
AMPLE STORAGE: Nike backpack has mesh side pockets for small-item storage and a large main compartment to store your gear; perfect as a school backpack, travel backpack, gym backpack and more.
COMFORTALE DESIGN: With adjustable shoulder straps padded for comfort and a sternum strap to help stabilize the pack on your back, this men's backpack is both comfortable and stylish.
ALTERNATIVE CARRYING OPTION: For those who don't want to wear the Nike backpack on their backs, the haul loop at the top offers an alternative carrying option.
DIMENSIONS: Lightweight backpack is 18"H x 15"W x 7"D/1526 cu. in. Plus, it features a large Nike Futura logo printed on the front of the backpack.
